note.p: Scottish engineer. Born in Knockando, Morayshire; lived at 46 Eglinton Street, Glasgow. Machine maker for D. Cook & Co., engineers and machine makers in Glasgow.
Census returns of Scotland 1851 (The National Archives of Scotland: Gorbals 2C/21)
UK and Ireland, Find a grave index, 1300s–current (Ancestry.com, accessed 14 June 2022)
